name: shell-tool
description: Guarded shell command execution for VS Code language models.

languageModelTools.name: shell
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute shell commands in the user workspace. Always set workdir and request with_escalated_permissions plus a short justification for anything beyond the default sandbox.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Run guarded shell commands with explicit workdir/approval controls.

command.description: argv vector the model wants to run (e.g. ["bash","-lc","rg ..."]).

workdir.description: Absolute or workspace-relative directory to run from. Defaults to the first workspace folder when omitted.

timeout_ms.description: Maximum wall-clock runtime before the command is cancelled (milliseconds).

with_escalated_permissions.description: Set true when the command needs elevated access outside the default sandbox.

justification.description: One-sentence justification required whenever with_escalated_permissions is true.
